Harrisonburg.Valley Mall (Harrisonburg):
Valley Mall is a shopping mall in Harrisonburg, Virginia, owned by Macerich and serving the Central Shenandoah Valley area of Virginia. It currently features more than 50 stores, with JCPenney, Belk, Dick's Sporting Goods, and Target serving as anchor stores.


== History ==
JCPenney was an original anchor store, along with Watson's (later Peebles), and Leggett (now Belk).
